unnormalised: Thik aacha, nwng Bharatni gejeo urlaigwn thanwi bwihw? Airwayni bthayo swmai. Ang swrang swrangwi IndiGo jwrao budget SpiceJet arw onthai onthai jwnwmw Air India simang urlihw. A dwnya gibiyaari, ang nwngnao hwtharakw!

unnormalised: Simang nwng kham hwnwi bwihar, ongnaigra hagrajanw. Ang MakeMyTrip ba Yatra jaisa websiteao swnwmwi jwnwmwi. normalised: Fwrbwi, thik songsar ni songsar, be dami. Ang bejarang MakeMyTrip ba Yatra jaisani website-o swrwk hunthaowai. Uwra gwbwn airline-nw compare khalama, nwngnw rupee rwibwi hajar phaiswi hwrui rupee dwji hajar jakni fare dekhai, ubra route arw somoinwi hwthaowi. unnormalised: SpiceJet budget raja. Nwngni travelkhow phwngkhamwi arw baggage feeswi bachao kwraiwi pack light kwraiwi, nwng mwjwng deal hwilwhw. Onthai thaikhamwi jwnwmwi. Ang flight SG304 Hyderabad simang Goa simang 2 hourswi onthai.

unnormalised: Air India, ah, Air India. A OG, Maharaja! Uwmwnw mwjwngkwraiwi bwtharakw, uwmwnw hagwi hwnwmwnw. Ang flight AI405 London (LHR) simang Delhi simang 16/03/2023wi jwnwmw mixed bagwi. Dikhw mwjwng, blda in-flight entertainment system glitchywi. Arw uwmwnw strict baggage allowance dwiwi.

unnormalised: Thwbwi Vistara dwiwi, nwng bejwng luxury thanwi thanwi. Uwmwnw premium economy arw business class offer kwrai, tabwi nwng splurge thanwi, Vistara nwngni airline. Uwmwnwi service excellentwi, arw uwmwnwi plane newwi. Ong, uwmwnwi Delhi simang Mumbai flight Rs. 10000wi hwimw hwnwmwnw.

unnormalised: Pro tip: Nwngni flightkhow 1 monthwi advance kwrai, dwisa peak season jwnwmwi. Arw seriously, airline appkhow download kwrai. Uwmwnw check in arw flight tracking bejwng mwjwngwi kwrai. IndiGo app example, flight statusni real-time updates kwrai arw web check-in offer kwrai.

unnormalised: Kham airline choose kwraiwi, Bharatni urlaigwn gibiyaari. Chaos embrace kwrai, airportao chai grab kwrai, arw ride enjoy kwrai. Happy travels!
